info.name: Smogon Noir
info.description: The complete Smogon dark theme experience is back, and looks better than ever! This theme re-stylizes everything Smogon (including the Forums, Articles, and Dex!) and has changed the color of almost every element so it all feels natural. Blacks, grays, and red accents are the basis of this theme. Please direct all feedback here: http://www.smogon.com/forums/threads/smogon-noir-a-complete-dark-theme-for-smogon.3626417/
info.additionalInfo:
Dec 2, 2019;v.1.13: Fixed like icons, less white, improved profile page consistency
Apr 9, 2019;v.1.12.2: Fixed show older thread/language select/link embed
Feb 9, 2019;v.1.12.1: Small changes for increased support with xf 2.1
Feb 3, 2019;v.1.12: Update to support xf upgrade
Feb 1, 2019;v.1.11.5: Improved support for attachments
Jan 6, 2019;v.1.11.4: Fixed table alt row BG colors; fixed bug with forum style selector
Dec 16, 2018;v.1.11.3: Added support for bracket maker
Oct 24, 2018;v.1.11.2.2: Minor bug fixes
Oct 23, 2018;v.1.11.2.1: Fixed preview and hide buttons; Improved article support
Oct 22, 2018; v.1.11.2: Quick fix for SSBB article
Aug 26, 2018; v.1.11.1: Export sets is now dark; fixed bug on help page
Aug 11, 2018; v.1.11: Added support for image uploads; changed post toolbar colors; minor bug fixes
Jul 1, 2018; v.1.10.6: Added support for smog outdated article; fixed flickering in dex
Mar 25, 2018; v.1.10.5: Improved CMS support
Mar 18, 2018; v.1.10.4: Dex works again; fixed article nav and content
Mar 14, 2018; v.1.10.3: Fixed page BG color
Mar 4, 2018; v1.10.2: Added support for search error message and inline bbCode
Feb 25, 2018; v1.10.1: Reverted old post color; various bug fixes
Feb 21, 2018; v1.10: Added support for users online list, various bug fixes
Feb 13, 2018; v1.9.1: Added support for nav arrow/collapsible sidebar when window small
Feb 4, 2018; v.1.9: Fixed twitter embeds, list of old alerts; added support for PM userlist.
Jan 27, 2018; v.1.8: Fixed Firebot mods list, old alert BG; enhanced link contrast
Jan 19, 2018; v.1.7: Overhauled the theme to work with the new forums
Jun 24, 2017; v.1.6.1: Enhanced link contrast on profile page
Jun 11, 2017; v.1.6: Fixed tables, save draft, search warnings; Removed underline from date/time.
Feb 15, 2017; v1.55: Added support for Smogon Awards page; further improvements to overal stability and other minor adjustments
Jan 28, 2017; v1.5: Fixed sortable tables
Jan 22, 2017; V1.4: Fixed main page border; added support for SFP page, and PHP tags
Jan 8, 2017; V1.3: Fixed links hidden on hover, arrows; added support for inserting media, types effectiveness popup on Dex
Jan 2, 2017; V1.2: Further browser compatibility, added support for thread snippets and attachments
Jan 1, 2017; V1.1: Increased compatibility with Chrome
Jan 1, 2017; V1.0: Initial Commit
